parameter.name: SeparateSequenceNumbersInFileNames
parameter.description: Defines if the output file names have common or independent sequence numbering.

parameter.name: TargetLinksConfigurationFileName
parameter.description: Defines the name of the output link configurations XML file.

parameter.name: InputFileNameExtractionMask
parameter.description: Defines the regular expression that is used extract information from original input file name for the output file name.

parameter.name: OutputFileNameCreationMask
parameter.description: Defines the output file name creation pattern to be used for output files.

parameter.name: RemoveFileTemplatesTimeout
parameter.description: Defines the period of time that the output files memory structures are kept waiting for further files to be created after the file has been sent.

parameter.name: SeparationCondition
parameter.description: Defines whether input records with different values for metadata or input field are written to separate output files.

parameter.name: CreateEmptyOutputFiles
parameter.description: Defines whether an empty output files shall be created.

parameter.name: OutputDescriptionFileName
parameter.description: Defines the name of the output description file.

parameter.name: CreateEmptyOutputFileOnFlush
parameter.description: Defines whether an empty output files shall be created when node is flushed.

parameter.name: CreateEmptyOutputFileOnSeparation
parameter.description: Defines whether the handling of an input file that does not contain any records or contains the control records only is indicated to the following node with an empty output file.

parameter.name: RecordWaitingTimeLimit
parameter.description: Defines the maximum period of time that a file can be open after last record has been written to it.

parameter.name: MaxAgeOfFile
parameter.description: Defines the maximum period of time that a file can be open after creation.

parameter.name: ResetInterval
parameter.description: Defines how often the file sequence numbers in output file names are reset.

parameter.name: RecordLimit
parameter.description: Defines the maximum number of records in a file before it will be closed.

parameter.name: RemoveFileTemplates
parameter.description: Defines whether memory structures of the output files are deleted after the file is sent.

parameter.name: RealTimeDelivery
parameter.description: Defines whether a control record is created containing the output record's length and offset in the output file.

parameter.name: SeparateSequenceNumbersInOutput
parameter.description: Defines if the file and record sequence counters in encoded output data have common or independent sequence numbering.

parameter.name: MinAgeOfFile
parameter.description: Defines the minimum period that a file must be open after its creation before it can be closed.

parameter.name: CloseFilesAtSchedule
parameter.description: Defines if the output files can be closed in schedule.

parameter.name: UniqueOutputFileNames
parameter.description: Defines if unique output file names are required.

parameter.name: DefaultOutputFilesLink
parameter.description: Default output link if no rule matches on output links configurations.

parameter.name: SeparateSourceID
parameter.description: Defines whether the input records from different sources are written to separate output files.

parameter.name: FileSizeLimit
parameter.description: Defines the maximum size of an output file.

message.text: Encoder can support only one output link.
message.explanation: Verify that the configuration does have only one output link for Encoder.

message.text: File %s does not exist. Multiple output links feature is not activated.
message.explanation: A value is given in parameter TargetLinksConfigurationFileName, but the file is not exists.

message.text: Unknown length type '%s' at line %s.
message.explanation: Verify that the element in output description is correct.

message.text: Unknown substitution '%s' at line %s.
message.explanation: Verify that the value for substitution in output description is correct.

message.text: Unable to create an unique output file from OutputFileNameCreationMask '%s'.
message.explanation: It was not possible to have a output file name different from the name of the previous file. Verify that your output name creation mask makes it possible to have unique output file names.

message.text: Parsing error: %s
message.explanation: Verify that the element in output description is correct.

message.text: Unable to load configuration parameter %s.
message.explanation: Encoder was unable to load a configuration parameter. Verify that the parameter exists and is valid.

message.text: Default output files link '%s' is not valid.
message.explanation: Output link defined in parameter DefaultOutputFilesLink is not a valid link.

message.text: Unable to load configuration parameter %s.
message.explanation: Encoder was unable to load a configuration parameter. Verify that the parameter exists and is valid.

message.text: %s is not a output link.
message.explanation: The output link is not valid.

message.text: Record name %s is reserved for internal use.
message.explanation: The record name is reserved. Use another record name in the whole stream or convert the record name to another in an intermediate node.

message.text: Lower limit %s defined for the set was not reached.
message.explanation: The defined minimum number of elements that must be present in the encoding was not rached.

message.text: Unable to write data to temporary output file '%s'.
message.explanation: It was not possible to write to the temporary output file. This error message should be accompanied by an error message that provides the reason for error.

message.text: No elements described in output description '%s'.
message.explanation: Verify that the value for substitution in output description is correct.

message.text: Unknown attribute '%s' at line %s.
message.explanation: Verify that the element in output description is correct.

message.text: File %s contained %s invalid field(s) in its headers and trailers.
message.explanation: A number of fields of headers and trailers could not be written because their value is invalid. Verify the output description.

message.text: Unable to close an output file.
message.explanation: It was not possible to close the file.

message.text: Unable to allocate memory.
message.explanation: Encoder was unable to allocate memory.

message.text: Unable to use temporary output file '%s'. Storing it as '%s'.
message.explanation: A temporary output file was found from the storage, but it can not be used because a tag for it was not found or the output description has changed. It will be renamed and stored in the internal storage directory.

message.text: Unknown value type '%s' at line %s.
message.explanation: Verify that the element in output description is correct.

message.text: Unable to open the temporary output file '%s'. Storing it as '%s'.
message.explanation: An open temporary output file was found from the internal storage directory, but a file tag for it was not found. The file is renamed and stored in internal storage directory.

message.text: Unknown order '%s' at line %s.
message.explanation: Verify that the element in output description is correct.

message.text: Unable to obtain a unique creation time.
message.explanation: It was not possible to have a creation time different from the creation time of the previous file.

message.text: File '%s' contains %s invalid format records that cannot be encoded. Please see the Rejected storage 'REJ' for detailed reason for the rejection.
message.explanation: EventLink Multi-format Encoder has rejected invalid records. See the Rejected Data Storage for the rejected data file.

message.text: %s
message.explanation: Encoder was unable to initialise counter defined in the output description.

message.text: %s
message.explanation: The input record alone is larger than the defined file size limit.

message.text: Unable to initialise XML parser.
message.explanation: Encoder was unable to initialise XML Parser for reading the output description.

message.text: Unknown orientation '%s' at line %s.
message.explanation: Verify that the element in output description is correct.

message.text: %s
message.explanation: The header alone is larger than the defined file size limit.

message.text: Unable to remove sequence number counter for separation value '%s'.
message.explanation: It was not possible to remove the given counter. This error message should be accompanied with error message that provides the reason for error.

message.text: Failed to parse or validate output links configuration XML (%s) - %s
message.explanation: Error parsing or validate the configuration XML.

message.text: Unable to open output description file '%s'.
message.explanation: Verify that the output description exists and that the permissions are correct.

message.text: Unknown element '%s' at line %s.
message.explanation: Verify that the element in output description is correct.

message.text: Unable to create sequence number counter for separation value '%s'.
message.explanation: It was not possible to add new counter to the memory. This error message should be accompanied with error message that provides the reason for error.

message.text: Conversion error: %s
message.explanation: Encoder was unable to convert the input data according to output description.
